sec.p: From 3 years old onwards, the nutritional recommendations regarding fats are the same as those for adults. It is necessary to pay greater attention to one’s lifestyle during these years, as the consumption of baked goods, snacks, cookies and chips is especially widespread in this age range [ 4]. Desserts and other such products contain refined oils, enhanced flours, chemical yeast, synthesized vitamins, sugars, high salt content, toxic products deriving from high-temperature cooking, and palm oil as well. This is the reason why palm oil cannot be considered the only culprit for the ill health effects of this junk food [ 30].
